value.name: I Fell in Love With the Girl Who Gave Me an Eraser
value.original_name: 消しゴムをくれた女子を好きになった。
value.overview: Fukuda Yu is a young man who fell in love with a girl that gave him half of her eraser in the second year of junior high school. The unrequited love continued for the next 13 years which was filled with laughter and tears.
